name: Voice Similarity (MOS)
description: Mean Opinion Score evaluation for voice cloning similarity - how well synthetic voice matches the target speaker.

metrics.name: mos_similarity
metrics.definition: Mean Opinion Score for speaker similarity (1-5 scale)

metrics.name: speaker_verification_eer
metrics.definition: Equal Error Rate for speaker verification

test_method: Listeners compare cloned voice to reference speaker and rate similarity. Also use objective speaker verification metrics (cosine similarity, EER).
notes: Voice similarity evaluation requires reference audio from target speaker. Both subjective (MOS) and objective (speaker verification) metrics should be reported.
